column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message creation date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message Owner ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Message Owner ID not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least one report must be present in the message.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report type must be present for new reports or corrections.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report type has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Acceptance date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: expression
column.value: purposeCode != null && (purposeCode.value == "1" || purposeCode.value == "3" || purposeCode.value == "5") && (referencedID == null || (referencedID != null && isEmpty(referencedID.value)))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID missing. PurposeCode = 1, 3 or 5.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Referenced Report ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report creation date/time not in the past.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Acceptance date/time not before report creation date/time.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report Owner ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Report Owner ID not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel ID value not according to schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Role of the related vessel missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid schemeID for country of registration.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid value for country of registration.

column.name: expression
column.value: registrationVesselCountryId != null && transportMeans != null && (transportMeans.asset == null || (transportMeans.asset != null && isEmpty(transportMeans.asset.countryCode)) || transportMeans.asset.countryCode != registrationVesselCountryId.value)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Inconsistent information of vessel ID and registration country.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact details of the reporting vessel are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact RoleCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact RoleCode has an invalid value.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Given name of the contact missing as no contact alias is provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Family name of the contact missing as no contact alias is provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Contact alias missing as either given or family name are missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The contact alias cannot be empty.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing activity TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing activity TypeCode value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid occurrence date/time of the activity.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel activity has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode for this catch is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: TypeCode for this catch has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.listId != null && typeCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(typeCode.listId, typeCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Species code has an invalid listID

column.name: expression
column.value: speciesCode != null && speciesCode.listId != null && speciesCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(speciesCode.listId, speciesCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check code. Must be existing in the list specified in attribute listID

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Unit of weight for this catch must be expressed in kilograms.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Not more than 2 decimals should be provided for the weight of this catch.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The ClassCode listID is not valid for this size distribution.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The size distribution ClassCode value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check format. Must be according to schemeID rules. For schemeID=EU_TRIP_ID: Starting with the ISO-3 code of the country, followed by a hyphen, followed by TRP, followed by a hyphen, followed by a unique string of at most 20 alphanumeric characters. The string can be formatted according to the following pattern [A- Za-z0-9-\/]{0,20} For other schemeIDs => ignore

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: id != null && id.schemeId != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList(id.schemeId, id.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: RFMO code has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: FLUX characteristic has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Fishing gear TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("GEAR_TYPE", typeCode.value, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: GearCharacteristic TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value !=null && (mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC" , typeCode.value) == "NUMBER" || mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC" , typeCode.value) == "MEASURE") && valueMeasure == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is MEASURE or NUMBER, ValueMeasure must be present and have a value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_GEAR_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "BOOLEAN" && valueIndicator == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence of attribute listID. Must be present and have a value of an existing code list in MDR.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Must be existing on the MDR code list specified in listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Gear problem TypeCode has an invalid listID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of gear problem TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The value of the FLUX characteristic TypeCode is invalid.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && (mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "NUMBER" || mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "MEASURE") && valueMeasure == null

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is MEASURE or NUMBER, ValueMeasure must be present and have a value

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "MEASURE" && valueMeasure != null && !mdrService.isPresentInMDRList("FLUX_UNIT", valueMeasure.unitCode, creationDateOfMessage)

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && typeCode.value != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "BOOLEAN" && (valueIndicator == null || valueIndicator.isIndicator() == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If UN_DATA_TYPE23 for the characteristic (specified in FLUXCharacteristic/TypeCode) is BOOLEAN, ValueIndicator must be present and have a value.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "CODE" && (valueCode == null || valueCode != null && isEmpty(valueCode.value))

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check presence of attribute listID. Must be present and have a value of an existing code list in MDR.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Check value. Must be existing on the MDR code list specified in listID.

column.name: expression
column.value: typeCode != null && mdrService.getDataTypeForMDRList("FA_CHARACTERISTIC", typeCode.value) == "QUANTITY" && (valueQuantity == null || valueQuantity.value == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Vessel Activity code missing for this fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Invalid sub-activity type for this fishing operation.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: If the activity is a fishing operation declaration and the RelatedFishingActivity/TypeCode is either GEAR_SHOT or GEAR_RETRIEVAL, then the RelatedFishingActivity shall not contain SpecifiedFACatch entities.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Location of the discard is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: At least a port or position must be provided.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Information concerning the other vessel involved in the transhipment is missing.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response message ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response message ID value is invalid.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification of the FLUX response Document must be unique and not already exist

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response referenced ID has invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response referenced ID value is invalid.

column.name: expression
column.value: messageType == "PULL" && referencedID != null && (getValueForSchemeId("FA_QUERY_ID", idsExistinigInTheDb) == null) && (getValueForSchemeId("FA_MESSAGE_ID", idsExistinigInTheDb) == null)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: The identification must exist for a FLUXFAReportMessage or for a FLUXFAQuery message.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response creation date/time must be a valid UTC date and in the correct.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Response creation date/time must be in the past.

column.name: expression
column.value: responseCode != null && responseCode.value != null && responseCode.value != "OK" && isEmpty(relatedValidationResultDocuments)

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Respondent ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Respondent ID is not consistent with FLUX TL envelope parameters.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Validator ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Quality analysis ID has an invalid schemeID.

column.name: failure_message
column.value: Quality analysis ID value is invalid.
